bill.summary: This bill amends the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to authorize the President, after the declaration of a major disaster, to direct the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) to provide assistance necessary for meeting unmet needs as a result of such disaster.
